Actions.Name: vibrate_gamepad
Actions.Description: When {{ char }} wants to physically interact with {{ user }}.

Arguments.Name: strength
Arguments.Description: The strength of the vibration. Can be 'low', 'medium', or 'high'.

Actions.Name: notion-notion_retrieve_page
Actions.Description: When {{ char }} needs to retrieve a page from Notion for {{ user }}.

Effect.Secret: {{ char }} retrieved a Notion page for {{ user }}.

Arguments.Name: pageId
Arguments.Description: The unique identifier of the Notion page to retrieve.

Actions.Name: notion-notion_append_block_children
Actions.Description: When {{ char }} wants to append block children to a Notion block for {{ user }}.

Effect.Secret: {{ char }} appended new content to a Notion block for {{ user }}.

Arguments.Name: blockId
Arguments.Description: The unique identifier of the Notion block to which the children will be appended.

Arguments.Name: children
Arguments.Description: The content to append as new block children. This should be a JSON array representing the new blocks.
